import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { appName:string = 'fundamentals-app'; angularLogo:string = "https://angular.io/assets/images/logos/angular/angular.svg" btnDisabled:boolean = true email:string = "edu@eml.run" mostrarAlerta() { alert("Alerta ‚ö†Ô∏è") } contadorOvejas:number = 0 contarOveja() { this.contadorOvejas += 1 } persona:any = { nombre: '' } listaPersonas: string[] = [] agregarPersona():void { this.listaPersonas.push(this.persona.nombre) this.persona.nombre = '' } borrarPersona(index: number):void { this.listaPersonas.splice(index, 1) } miPokedex:any[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { fetch(`https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon?limit=8&offset=${Math.floor(Math.random() * 501)}`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data.results) this.miPokedex = data.results }) } }
